trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Kjo ju lejon të bëni dhe ngarkoni foto.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you unlock the app.
trans-unit.target: Kjo ju lejon të shkyçni aplikacionin.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Face ID Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: Sajtet që vizitoni mund të kërkojmë të dinë vendndodhjen tuaj.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Kjo ju lejon të xhironi dhe ngarkoni video.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Microphone Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Kjo ju lejon të ruani dhe ngarkoni foto.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description
This is the menu item that appears when you long press the Focus icon on the phone home screen.

trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.
trans-unit.target: Fshini kurdo, me një prekje të vetme, historikun e shfletimit për sesionin, fjalëkalimet, cookie-t.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'History' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: Historiku juaj i takon të shkuarës
trans-unit.note: Title for the third panel 'History' in the First Run tour.
Button to go to the next card in Focus onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose a different search engine.
trans-unit.target: Po kërkoni për diçka tjetër? Zgjidhni një tjetër motor kërkimesh.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Favorite Search Engine' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the second panel 'Search' in the First Run tour.
Button to skip onboarding in Focus

trans-unit.source: Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.
trans-unit.target: Kalojeni shfletimin privat në nivelin pasues. Bllokoni reklama dhe lëndë tjetër që mund t’ju gjurmojë nga sajti në sajt dhe të ulë kohën e ngarkimit të faqeve.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.
Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
trans-unit.target: %@ prodhohet nga Mozilla. Misioni ynë është të përkujdesemi për një Internet të shëndetshëm, të hapur.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Search and browse right in the app
trans-unit.target: Kërkoni dhe shfletoni drejt e nga aplikacioni
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block trackers (or update settings to allow trackers)
trans-unit.target: Bllokoni gjurmues (ose përditësoni rregullimet që të lejoni gjurmues)
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history
trans-unit.target: Fshijeni që të fshihen cookie-t, si dhe historik kërkimesh dhe shfletimesh
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a private browser:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen
Label for row in About screen
Link to Privacy Notice in the About screen
Label for row in About screen

trans-unit.target: Për përmirësim të privatësisë, bllokoni gjurmuesit
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block web fonts to reduce page size
trans-unit.target: Bllokoni shkronja Web që të zvogëlohet madhësia e faqes
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a Safari extension:
trans-unit.target: Përdoreni si një zgjerim të Safari-t:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

%@ is the name of the app (Focus / Klar). Title displayed in the settings screen that, when tapped, takes the user to a page with information about the product. Also displayed as a header for the About page.
Label on About screen
Button to dismiss the 'Add Pass Failed' alert.

trans-unit.source: An error occured while adding the pass to Wallet. Please try again later.

trans-unit.target: Bëni mirëfilltësimin që të ktheheni te %@

trans-unit.target: %@ dëshiron të hapë një tjetër Aplikacion

Button label for opening another app from Focus
Button label in external link dialog to cancel the dialog. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Button label in mailto: dialog to send an email. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html

Accessibility label for previous result button in Find in Page Toolbar.

trans-unit.target: Shfletoni sikur të mos ju vëzhgonte njeri.
trans-unit.note: Message label on the first run screen
Button label used to close a menu that displays as a popup.
Text for a label that indicates the title of button from onboarding screen version 2.
Text for a label that indicates the subtitle for the onboarding screen version 2.
Text for a label that indicates the title of button from onboarding screen
Text for a label that indicates the title of the bottom button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: We clear your history when you close the app for extra privacy.
trans-unit.target: E pastrojmë historikun tuaj, kur mbyllni aplikacionin, për më tepër privatësi.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the first subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Make %@ your default to protect your data with every link you open.
trans-unit.target: Bëjeni %@-in parazgjedhjen tuaj, që të mbroni të dhënat tuaja për çdo lidhje që hapni.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the second subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar)
Text for a label that indicates the title for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar)
Text for a label that indicates the title of the top button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Erase your browsing history, passwords, cookies, and prevent unwanted ads from following you in a simple click!
trans-unit.target: Fshini historikun e shfletimeve tuaja, fjalëkalime, cookies dhe parandaloni ndjekjen tuaj nga reklama të padëshiruara, me një klikim të thjeshtë!
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of history section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.target: Historiku juaj s’ju ndjek nga pas
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title of history section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: %@ is a dedicated privacy browser with tracking protection and content blocking.
trans-unit.target: %@ është një shfletues i përkushtuar privatësisë, me mbrojtje nga gjurmimet dhe bllokim lënde.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of incognito section from onboarding screen. Placeholder can be (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.target: Më tepër se thjesht i padukshëm
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title of incognito section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: Configure settings so you can decide how much or how little you share.
trans-unit.target: Formësoni rregullimet, që të mund të vendosni se shumë apo sa pak të ndani me të tjerët.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of protection section from onboarding screen.
Text for a label that indicates the title of protection section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: Take your private browsing to the next level.
trans-unit.target: Shpjereni një shkallë më lart shfletimin tuaj privat.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the subtitle for onboarding screen.
Text for a label that indicates the title for onboarding screen. Placeholder can be (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.source: Tap Safari, then select Content Blockers
trans-unit.target: Prekni Safari-n, mandej përzgjidhni Bllokues Lënde
trans-unit.note: Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Label for instructions to enable extensions in Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Error label when the blocker is not enabled, shown in the intro and main app when disabled
Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Label for instructions to enable extensions in Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Save button label

trans-unit.source: That didn’t work. Try replacing the search term with this: %s.
trans-unit.target: Kjo nuk bëri punë. Provoni të zëvendësoni termin e kërkimit me këtë: %s.
trans-unit.note: Label for error state when entering an invalid search engine URL. %s is a search term in a URL.
Label for disable option on search suggestions prompt
Label for enable option on search suggestions prompt

trans-unit.source: To get suggestions, %@ needs to send what you type in the address bar to the search engine.
trans-unit.target: Që të merrni sugjerime, %@ ka nevojë të dërgojë te motori juaj i kërkimeve atë çka shtypni te shtylla e adresave.
trans-unit.note: %@ is the name of the app (Focus / Klar). Label for search suggestions prompt message
Title for search suggestions prompt

trans-unit.target: U shtua Motor i Ri Kërkimesh.

Label for button to bring deleted default engines back

Label for input of search engine template

trans-unit.source: Paste or enter search string. If necessary, replace search term with: %s.
trans-unit.target: Ngjitni ose jepni varg kërkimi. Në u dashtë, zëvendësojeni termin e kërkimit me: %s.
trans-unit.note: Placeholder text for input of new search engine template
Title for the URL Autocomplete row

trans-unit.source: Blocking other content trackers may break some videos and web pages.
trans-unit.target: Bllokimi i gjurmuesve të tjerë mund të pengojë funksionimin e disa videove dhe faqeve Web.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when toggling the Content blocker

trans-unit.source: %@ will send what you type in the address bar to your search engine.

trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Search Suggestions toggle on main screen. %@ is the app name (Focus/Klar)

trans-unit.source: Mozilla strives to collect only what we need to provide and improve %@ for everyone.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla rreket të grumbullojë vetëm sa na duhen për të ofruar dhe përmirësuar %@ për këdo.
trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Send Usage Data toggle on main screen. %@ is the app name (Focus/Klar)

trans-unit.source: %@ may install and run studies from time to time.
trans-unit.target: %@-i mund të instalojë dhe zhvillojë studime herë pas here.
trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Studies toggle on the settings screen. %@ is the app name (Focus/Klar)

trans-unit.target: Kyçe %@, kur një sajt është i hapur:

trans-unit.target: Veprime Faqeje > Kërko Sajtin Për Desktop
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for request desktop tip.

trans-unit.source: Want to see the full desktop version of a site?
trans-unit.target: Doni të shihni versionin e plotë për desktop të një sajti?
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for request desktop tip.

Text for a label that indicates the description for share trackers tip. The placeholder is the number of trackers blocked. Only shown when there are more than 10 trackers blocked. For locales where we would need plural support, please feel free to translate this string as `Trackers blocked so far: %@` instead.
Text for a label that indicates the title for share trackers tip. The placeholder is replaced with the long product name (Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar).

trans-unit.source: Select Add to Shortcuts from the %@ menu
trans-unit.target: Përzgjidhni “Shtoje te Shkurtoret” që prej menusë %@
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for shortcuts tip. The placeholder is replaced with the short product name (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.source: Create shortcuts to the sites you visit most:
trans-unit.target: Krijoni shkurtore për te sajtet që vizitoni më shpesh:
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for shortcuts tip.
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri erase tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri erase tip. The placeholder is replaced with the long product name (Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar).
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri favorite tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri favorite tip.

trans-unit.target: Provoni të çaktivizoni Mbrojtje Nga Gjurmimet
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for sites not working tip.

trans-unit.source: Site missing content or acting strange?
trans-unit.target: Mungon lëndë te sajti, apo po sillet në mënyrë të çuditshme?
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for sites not working tip.
Text shown on quick action widget inviting the user to browse in the app. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar).

trans-unit.source: Go to Settings to manage specific privacy & security options.
trans-unit.target: Kaloni te Rregullimet, që të administroni mundësi specifike privatësie & sigurie.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Context Menu icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: These default settings offer strong protection. But it’s easy to tweak the settings to meet your specific needs.
trans-unit.target: Këto rregullime parazgjedhje ofrojnë mbrojtje të fuqishme. Por s’është e lehtë të përimtohen gjërat, për të plotësuar nevojat tuaja specifike.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: Start your private browsing session, and we’ll block trackers and other bad stuff as you go.
trans-unit.target: Filloni sesionin tuaj të shfletimit privat dhe ne do të bllokojmë dora-dorës gjurmues dhe gjëra të tjera të këqija.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Search Bar tooltip

trans-unit.source: %@ stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield for info on what we blocked.
trans-unit.target: %@ e ndali spiunimin tuaj nga ky sajt. Për hollësi se ç’kemi bllokuar, prekni mburojën.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip. Where placeholder can be (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.source: Got ‘em! We stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield any time to see what we’re blocking.
trans-unit.target: I mbërthyem! E ndalëm spiunimin tuaj nga ky sajt. Prekni kurdo mburojën, që të shihni se ç’jemi duke bllokuar.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip when we block trackers for the first time on a website

trans-unit.source: Tap the trash anytime to remove all traces of your current session.
trans-unit.target: Prekni hedhurinat kurdo, që të hiqen krejt gjurmët e sesionit tuaj të tanishëm.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: Tap here to trash it all — history, cookies, everything — and start fresh on a new tab.
trans-unit.target: Prekni këtu, që të shpihet e gjitha në hedhurina — historik, cookies, gjithçka — dhe fillojani nga e para me një skedë të re.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip
This is the title text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip
Label displayed for button used as a shortcut to add a link to the list of URLs to autocomplete.
Text for the URL context menu when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.
Erase button in the URL bar
Message shown after pressing the Erase button
Label displayed for find in page button when typing in the URL Bar. %@ is any text the user has typed into the URL bar that they want to find on the current page.

Text for the URL bar showing the number of trackers blocked on a webpage.
Title for the action button shown on card view that will take the user to a tutorial explaining the user how to add an widget

trans-unit.source: We’ll leave you to your private browsing, but get a quicker start next time with the %@ widget on your Home screen.
trans-unit.target: Do t’ju lëmë në shfletimin tuaj privat, por siguroni një kohë më të mirë nisjeje herës tjetër, me widget-in %@ në skenën tuaj Kreu.

Title shown on card view explaining the app has a widget option

Text for tracking protection screen showing the connection is secure
Title for the tracking settings page to change what trackers are blocked.

trans-unit.source: Protections are OFF for this session

Text for the toggle that enables/disables tracking protection.
Text for tracking protection screen showing the number of trackers blocked since the app install. The placeholder is replaced with the install date of the application.

trans-unit.target: Gjurmues dhe programthe për t’u bllokuar
trans-unit.note: Text for the header of trackers section from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.source: Content blocking and tracking protection from Mozilla
trans-unit.target: Bllokim lënde dhe mbrojtje nga gjurmimet, nga Mozilla
trans-unit.note: Human readable description

trans-unit.source: Add a %@ shortcut to your Home screen. After adding the widget, touch and hold to edit it and select a different shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Shtoni një shkurtore %@ për te skena juaj Kreu. Pasi të shtohet widget-i, prekeni dhe mbajeni të prekur, që ta përpunoni dhe të përzgjidhni një tjetër shkurtore.
trans-unit.note: Description for small size widget to add it to home screen. %@ is the name of the app(Focus/Klar).

trans-unit.source: Start a private search in %@ with your default search engine.
trans-unit.target: Filloni një kërkim privat në %@ me motorin tuaj parazgjedhje për kërkime.
trans-unit.note: Description for small size widget to add it to home screen. %@ is the name of the app(Focus/Klar).
Quick Actions title when widget enters edit mode
Text shown on quick action widget inviting the user to browse in the app. %@ is the name of the app (Focus/Klar).
